1.8.9.1.0.1: Launch spell now also launches any entity you are riding (horses)
1.8.9.1.0.2: Portable waypoint now has durability and multiple uses
1.8.9.1.0.3: Now protected from falling out of the world
1.8.9.1.0.4: Fix water spell making source water blocks correctly
1.8.9.1.0.5: Make the temporary fragile blocks unharvestable even with silk touch.
1.8.9.1.1.0: There are now four wand types, each with the same spells but individual energy bars.  Replaced runestone items with passive spells directly on the wand.
